title: Germany's Adler Real Estate to buy ADO Group for 708 million euros
text:
Germany's Adler Real Estate to buy ADO Group for 708 million euros

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 09:55)

© Reuters. Germany's Adler Real Estate to buy ADO Group for 708 million euros JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Germany's Adler Real Estate (DE: ) has agreed to buy ADO Group (TA: ), a Tel Aviv-listed shareholder in ADO Properties (DE: ), for 708 million euros (626 million pounds), the companies said on Monday. Following the acquisition, Adler will hold a 33% stake in ADO Properties, a 4.4 billion euro German-listed residential real estate company focused on Berlin. ADO Group will be delisted from the Tel Aviv Stock Exchange. The 708 million euro value represents an 83% premium on ADO Group's closing share price on Sunday. Shares were up 60.5% in Tel Aviv in late-morning trade. Adler said the deal will be funded by a combination of a rights issue, fully guaranteed and backstopped by Adler anchor shareholders, cash from disposals of non-yielding assets and financial debt.
